ratings.message: Eh.  This was an okay book.  The fact that the book only used the capital letter "E" felt a bit unoriginal.  Nevertheless, I enjoyed some parts of it.
ratings.author: floof_77

title: 243 Pages of James Complaining About That Dog That Just Won't Shut Up

ratings.message: This book resonated with me on a spiritual level.  5/5, no questions asked.
